name: The Evil Wizard
overview: The Evil Wizard is a single-player text based role-playing game (not a text adventure) for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Jesper Lindström and released into the public domain in 2001. A sequel called Evil Wizard II was released in 2012. However, that was a shoot em up. Note: The game's text has a lot of typos and grammar errors, probably due to English not being the coder's native language.
